languages.text: {n}Глаза Джай впали от бессонницы, амасека и усталости. Волосы спутались, а дорогие одежды измялись словно после драки.{/n} "Мы... Правда дождались? Клянусь Троном, смирение — это путь к сумасшествию. Не представляю, как святые мирятся со своими муками без амасека..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза Джай впали от бессонницы, амасека и усталости. Волосы спутались, а дорогие одежды измялись словно после драки.{/n} "Мы... Правда дождались? Клянусь Троном, смирение — это путь к сумасшествию. Не представляю, как святые мирятся со своими муками без амасека..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jae's eyes are sunken from lack of sleep, amasec, and exhaustion. Her hair is dishevelled, and her fine clothing is so rumpled one would think she had been brawling.{/n} "We've... really made it? I swear on the Throne, patience is the path to madness. I don't know how the saints live through their torments without amasec..."

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}由于缺乏睡眠，过度劳累，加之喝了艾玛赛克酒，婕伊的眼睛凹进了眼窝。她的头发变得乱糟糟的，原本精美的衣服也变得皱皱巴巴，看起来就像是刚刚和谁打了一架。{/n}“我们……真的等到号了吗？我敢向黄金王座发誓，耐心简直是通往疯狂的道路。我真不敢想象，那些圣徒怎么能在没有艾玛赛克酒的情况下，忍受得了这样的折磨……”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes are sunken from lack of sleep, amasec, and exhaustion. Her hair is dishevelled, and her fine clothing is so rumpled one would think she had been brawling.{/n} "We've... really made it? I swear on the Throne, patience is the path to madness. I don't know how the saints live through their torments without amasec..."

traits.locale_text: {n}由于缺乏睡眠，过度劳累，加之喝了艾玛赛克酒，婕伊的眼睛凹进了眼窝。她的头发变得乱糟糟的，原本精美的衣服也变得皱皱巴巴，看起来就像是刚刚和谁打了一架。{/n}“我们……真的等到号了吗？我敢向黄金王座发誓，耐心简直是通往疯狂的道路。我真不敢想象，那些圣徒怎么能在没有艾玛赛克酒的情况下，忍受得了这样的折磨……”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Los ojos de Jae están hundidos por el cansancio y la falta de sueño y amasec. Está despeinada y sus ropas elegantes están tan arrugadas que parece que acaba de salir de una pelea.{/n} «¿Lo hemos... conseguido? Juro por el Trono que la paciencia es el camino a la locura. No sé cómo los santos pueden soportar sus tormentos sin amasec...».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes are sunken from lack of sleep, amasec, and exhaustion. Her hair is dishevelled, and her fine clothing is so rumpled one would think she had been brawling.{/n} "We've... really made it? I swear on the Throne, patience is the path to madness. I don't know how the saints live through their torments without amasec..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los ojos de Jae están hundidos por el cansancio y la falta de sueño y amasec. Está despeinada y sus ropas elegantes están tan arrugadas que parece que acaba de salir de una pelea.{/n} «¿Lo hemos... conseguido? Juro por el Trono que la paciencia es el camino a la locura. No sé cómo los santos pueden soportar sus tormentos sin amasec...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}ジェイの目は、寝不足とアマセックと疲労のせいでくぼんでいる。髪は乱れ、上等な衣服もシワだらけになり、乱闘でもしたのかと思われそうだ。{/n}「あたしらさ…ホントに進んでるのかしら？王座に誓って言わせてもらうけれど、我慢は狂気に続く道よ。アマセックもなしにこんな苦痛を耐えるなんてどんな聖人様なのかしら…」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes are sunken from lack of sleep, amasec, and exhaustion. Her hair is dishevelled, and her fine clothing is so rumpled one would think she had been brawling.{/n} "We've... really made it? I swear on the Throne, patience is the path to madness. I don't know how the saints live through their torments without amasec..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイの目は、寝不足とアマセックと疲労のせいでくぼんでいる。髪は乱れ、上等な衣服もシワだらけになり、乱闘でもしたのかと思われそうだ。{/n}「あたしらさ…ホントに進んでるのかしら？王座に誓って言わせてもらうけれど、我慢は狂気に続く道よ。アマセックもなしにこんな苦痛を耐えるなんてどんな聖人様なのかしら…」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Jae sont creusés par le manque de sommeil, l'amasec et l'épuisement. Ses cheveux sont ébouriffés et ses beaux vêtements sont si froissés qu'on pourrait croire qu'elle vient de se bagarrer comme une chiffonnière.{/n} « Alors, ça y est... On a réussi ? Au nom du Trône, je jurerais que la patience est la voie la plus sûre vers la démence. C'est à se demander comment font les saints pour supporter leur calvaire sans le secours de l'amasec... »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes are sunken from lack of sleep, amasec, and exhaustion. Her hair is dishevelled, and her fine clothing is so rumpled one would think she had been brawling.{/n} "We've... really made it? I swear on the Throne, patience is the path to madness. I don't know how the saints live through their torments without amasec..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Jae sont creusés par le manque de sommeil, l'amasec et l'épuisement. Ses cheveux sont ébouriffés et ses beaux vêtements sont si froissés qu'on pourrait croire qu'elle vient de se bagarrer comme une chiffonnière.{/n} « Alors, ça y est... On a réussi ? Au nom du Trône, je jurerais que la patience est la voie la plus sûre vers la démence. C'est à se demander comment font les saints pour supporter leur calvaire sans le secours de l'amasec... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Jaes Augen sind von Schlafmangel, Amasec und Erschöpfung eingefallen. Ihre Frisur ist zerzaust und ihre schöne Kleidung so zerknittert, dass man glauben möchte, sie hätte sich geprügelt.{/n} "Haben wir ... es wirklich geschafft? Ich schwöre beim Thon, Geduld ist der Weg zum Wahnsinn. Ich weiß wirklich nicht, wie Heilige ihr Martyrium ohne Amasec überstehen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes are sunken from lack of sleep, amasec, and exhaustion. Her hair is dishevelled, and her fine clothing is so rumpled one would think she had been brawling.{/n} "We've... really made it? I swear on the Throne, patience is the path to madness. I don't know how the saints live through their torments without amasec..."

Ihre Frisur ist zerzaust und ihre schöne Kleidung so zerknittert, dass man glauben möchte, sie hätte sich geprügelt.{/n} "Haben wir ... es wirklich geschafft? Ich schwöre beim Thon, Geduld ist der Weg zum Wahnsinn. Ich weiß wirklich nicht, wie Heilige ihr Martyrium ohne Amasec überstehen ..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Uykusuzluk, amasek ve yorgunluktan Jae'ın gözleri çökmüş, saçları karman çorman olmuş, zarif kıyafetleri ise öylesine buruşmuş ki görenler kavgaya girdiğini sanabilir.{/n} "Yoksa... Gerçekten başardık mı? Taht'a ant içerim ki sabrın sonu olsa olsa delilik olabilir. Azizler amasek olmaksızın onca işkenceye nasıl dayanmış, hayret doğrusu..."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae's eyes are sunken from lack of sleep, amasec, and exhaustion. Her hair is dishevelled, and her fine clothing is so rumpled one would think she had been brawling.{/n} "We've... really made it? I swear on the Throne, patience is the path to madness. I don't know how the saints live through their torments without amasec..."
